S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m4: <math alttext="\left(x_{n}\right)\subset X" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">(</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo mathvariant="normal">)</mo></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">⊂</mo><mi>X</mi></mrow></math>

S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m6: <math alttext="R\left(x_{n}\right)\overset{w}{\rightarrow}0" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m6" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mi>R</mi><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">(</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo mathvariant="normal">)</mo></mrow><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mover accent="true"><mo mathvariant="normal">→</mo><mo>𝑤</mo></mover><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mn mathvariant="normal">0</mn></mrow></math>

S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m7: <math alttext="\ell^{\infty}" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m7" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">ℓ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></msup></math>

S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m8: <math alttext="S^{\ast}f_{n}\overset{w^{\ast}}{\rightarrow}0" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><msup><mi>S</mi><mo mathvariant="normal">∗</mo></msup><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mover accent="true"><mo mathvariant="normal">→</mo><msup><mi>w</mi><mo mathvariant="normal">∗</mo></msup></mover><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mn mathvariant="normal">0</mn></mrow></math>

S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m9: <math alttext="\left(\ell^{\infty}\right)^{\ast}" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m9" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">(</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">ℓ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></msup><mo mathvariant="normal">)</mo></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">∗</mo></msup></math>

S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m10: <math alttext="\ell^{\infty}" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">ℓ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></msup></math>

S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m11:
<math alttext="f_{n}\left(Tx_{n}\right)=\left(S^{\ast}f_{n}\right)\left(R\left(x_{n}\right)%
\right)\rightarrow 0" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem3.p2.m11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">(</mo><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">=</mo><mrow><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>S</mi><mo mathvariant="normal">∗</mo></msup><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">)</mo></mrow><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">(</mo><mrow><mi>R</mi><mo mathvariant="italic">⁢</mo><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">(</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo mathvariant="normal">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">→</mo><mn mathvariant="normal">0</mn></mrow></math>

S2.p13.m6: <math alttext="\left(z_{n}\right)\subset A^{+}:=A\cap E^{+}" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.p13.m6" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>z</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>⊂</mo><msup><mi>A</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>:=</mo><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><msup><mi>E</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow></mrow></math>

S2.p19.m4: <math alttext="0\leq S\leq T" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.p19.m4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>S</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>T</mi></mrow></math>

S2.Thmtheorem6.p1.m5: <math alttext="S,\ T:E\rightarrow F" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem6.p1.m5" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo mathvariant="normal" rspace="7.5pt">,</mo><mi>T</mi></mrow><mo mathvariant="normal">:</mo><mrow><mi>E</mi><mo mathvariant="normal">→</mo><mi>F</mi></mrow></mrow></math>

S2.Thmtheorem6.p1.m6: <math alttext="0\leq S\leq T" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem6.p1.m6" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mn mathvariant="normal">0</mn><mo mathvariant="normal">≤</mo><mi>S</mi><mo mathvariant="normal">≤</mo><mi>T</mi></mrow></math>

S2.p20.m1: <math alttext="0\leq f_{n}\left(Sx_{n}\right)\leq f_{n}\left(Tx_{n}\right)\rightarrow 0" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.p20.m1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mrow><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mrow><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>

S2.Thmtheorem7.p1.m4: <math alttext="\mathrm{(d)}" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.Thmtheorem7.p1.m4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo mathvariant="normal" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo mathvariant="normal" stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></math>

S2.p24.m8: <math alttext="0\leq f_{n}\leq f" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.p24.m8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>≤</mo><mi>f</mi></mrow></math>

S2.Ex3.m1: <math alttext="P(x)=\left(f_{n}(x)\right)_{n}" class="ltx_Math" display="block" id="S2.Ex3.m1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow></math>

S2.Ex5.m1:
<math alttext="\sum\limits_{n=1}^{N}\left|f_{n}\left(x\right)\right|\leq\sum\limits_{n=1}^{N}%
f_{n}\left(\left|x\right|\right)=\left(\vee_{n=1}^{N}f_{n}\right)\left(\left|x%
\right|\right)\leq f\left(\left|x\right|\right)" class="ltx_Math" display="block" id="S2.Ex5.m1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mi>N</mi></munderover><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mrow><munderover><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mi>N</mi></munderover><mrow><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msubsup><mo>∨</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mi>N</mi></msubsup><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

S2.p26.m10: <math alttext="T=S\circ P:E\rightarrow\ell^{1}\rightarrow F" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.p26.m10" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>∘</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>:</mo><mrow><mi>E</mi><mo>→</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">ℓ</mi><mn>1</mn></msup><mo>→</mo><mi>F</mi></mrow></mrow></math>

S2.p26.m11: <math alttext="T(x)=\sum\limits_{n=1}^{\infty}f_{n}(x)y_{n}" class="ltx_Math" display="inline" id="S2.p26.m11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><mi>T</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><munderover><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></munderover><mrow><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

S2.Ex6.m1:
<math alttext="T^{\ast}\left(g_{n}\right)=\sum\limits_{k=1}^{\infty}g_{n}\left(y_{k}\right)f_%
{k}\geq g_{n}\left(y_{n}\right)f_{n}\geq 0\text{.}" class="ltx_Math" display="block" id="S2.Ex6.m1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mrow><msup><mi>T</mi><mo>∗</mo></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><munderover><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∑</mo><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">∞</mi></munderover><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>k</mi></msub></mrow></mrow><mo>≥</mo><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mrow><mo>≥</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>.</mtext></mrow></mrow></math>
